### ERROR TIPS

### Errors when trying to connect pipes
- Ensure that there are no placement blockages between the entities you are trying to connect with pipes. Check the surrounding area for any existing entities that may obstruct the connection.

### Errors when placing into a tile which is occupied by another entity
- Ensure you can place an entity to a tile before attempting to place it. Check the position for any existing entities that may block placement.

### Errors related to power connections
- Make sure that all power-consuming entities are connected to a power network. Check the connections of small electric poles and ensure they are properly linked to the electricity group.
